name: Pamela Blake
what_you_do: Pamela Blake is the host of a unique platform that celebrates the literary legacy of her late husband, David Isaak, a brilliant author.
who_you_serve: Readers interested in exploring the profound themes and creative prowess of David Isaak's five extraordinary novels.
signature_programs: The Isaak Collection, which includes the novels Tomorrowville, A Map of the Edge, Things Unseen, Earthly Vessels, and Smite the Waters.
business_focus: Celebrating and sharing the literary works of the late author David Isaak.
